contextId.information: Standing up was a sign of honoring God will listening to his message. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_symaction]])
contextId.quote: The king got up out of his seat

contextId.information: Here, to anoint with oil is a symbolic action that represents appointing a person to be king. AT: "to appoint a king to rule over all of them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_symaction]])
contextId.quote: to anoint a king over them

contextId.information: "lay with their faces to the ground." This is a sign of respect and honor, but it also shows their fear of Yahweh. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_symaction]])
